synopsis.text: The Ayanoi High School is home to the Geijutsuka Art Design Class (GA), a haven for budding artists. Five vibrant friends, each with their own unique quirks, navigate the thrilling world of art together. The spirited Noda, a prankster with a knightly charm, teams up with the playful tomboy Tomokane to stir up mischief. Meanwhile, the sensible Namiko strives to maintain order amidst the chaos, while the perceptive and kind Oomichi Miyabi observes the group's antics with a knowing smile. Lastly, the sweet and bespectacled Yamaguchi Kisaragi explores her artistic flair through her beloved cat sketches. From sculpting to graphic design, these friends tackle every art challenge with enthusiasm, turning their everyday school life into a colorful canvas of friendship and creativity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
